message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $115. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
I understand your position, Bob, but I can't go as low as $105.  How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $108. I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
